name: By the Candlelight
description:
The player must keep the candle lit by using the mouse cursor to block the incoming gusts of winds.

This is a student project made in 2 weeks following the 10 seconds game theme.

We are taking feedbacks so if you could spare some time to fill in this short form, we would really appreciate it. https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1fj7ED--lFTOyFALKfAmx8zk8LmfjULNVsLTKpySHoZE

There is a sound bug. If the player clicks restart, the game over/win sound keeps playing.

Main theme: Machina by Scott Buckley | www.scottbuckley.com.au

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com
